title: How to write 10 lines about a good student - Quora

response.answer_text: A good Student is the one who not only scores well and be a topper but also excels in other extra curricular activities.. A good Student is the one who does not act too smart in front of teachers and show it in Answer sheet.. A good Student does not brag about him and help his fellow mates with their problems and be supportive… A good Student is well disciplined and is not SELFISH in sharing his notes and others stuffs… A good Student is the one who not only carries mark along with him but also beautiful memories and friendship with him that last longer… 😊💜
